plan_summary: Earn 5 points for every £1 spent in-store or online. Every three months we will convert your points into vouchers giving you 5p back for every full £1 spent! You can spend these vouchers on all your favourite things at The Works in-store or online.
plan_description: Whether you are looking for an inspirational read, crafting a new masterpiece, or entertaining the kids with some good old-fashioned fun and games, get more from your shop by earning 5 points for every full £1 you spend in-store and online. To get going just share your name and email address. Shop and save in-store or online. What do points mean? Vouchers! The Works will convert your points into redeemable vouchers for you four times a year to spend on all your favourite things!
redeem_instructions: At checkout, simply show this barcode as you normally would with your physical card to redeem vouchers.
plan_register_info: You have added a temporary card. You’ll need to register it to enjoy the full benefits of the programme.
